data.name: Negligee: DoubleD
data.detailed_description:
Everyone needs a holiday and Negligee store manager Hannah is no exception, after working herself to death for the past couple of years helping to grow the business she is finally taking some time for herself to travel across Europe. In the interim Jasmin is stepping up to manage the store in her absence, dealing with new staff and the various crazy shenanigans that often occur in the crazy world of lingerie.

Could this be Hannah's summer of love before she begins her newest challenge back at home and will Jasmin be able to control her nerves and be the best manager she can be?

In this sequel to the original Negligee story you will control both Hannah and Jasmin as they continue on this next chapter in their lives, and your decisions along the way will determine the outcome will their trials and tribulations, be it a success or a failure, will romances blossom or will they remain stunted. Only time and your decision can tell in this new chapter in the world of Negligee.

Features

  • Two protagonists whose decisions you control.
  • Two simultaneous Storylines with multiple routes.
  • A variety of chances for romance in both stories.
  • A variety of endings and secrets to explore and unlock.
  • New amazing backgrounds and locations.
  • Introducing new characters and old favourites.
  • A large amount of high quality illustrations throughout.
  • Un-lockable Gallery and Memories Screens.

data.short_description: Everyone needs a holiday and Hannah is no exception, as she is finally taking some time for a holiday. In the interim Jasmin is stepping up to manage the store in her absence. Your decisions will determine what happens to both these women in this new chapter in their lives.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes characters in states of undress and mature and suggestive dialogue descriptions.
